installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# NodeJS App Installation Script
#
# Server packages update
echo -e "setting npm permission for user"
chown -R 988:0 "/root/.npm"

apt update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc-9 g++-9 libtool build-essential screen

## Server directory creation
if [ ! -e /mnt/server ]; then
    echo -e "Server directory creation..."
    mkdir -p /mnt/server
fi
cd /mnt/server

if [ -e package.lock.json ]; then
    rm -f package.lock.json
fi
if [ -e node_modules ]; then
    rm -rf node_modules
fi

echo -e "updating npm. please wait..."
npm install npm@6.14.16 -g

## NPM settings
echo -e "setting up npm..."
update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/gcc gcc /usr/bin/gcc-9 60 --slave /usr/bin/g++ g++ /usr/bin/g++-9

## Server installation/update

echo -e "installing screeps server..."
npm install screeps

## Screeps files initialization
if [ -e .screepsrc ]; then
    echo "No server initialization needed because screeps files already exists"
else
    echo "Initializing server files..."
    echo -e ${STEAM_API_KEY} | npx screeps init
fi

echo -e "install complete"
exit 0
